name: Home Decorator Simulator
description:
!!Warning!!!

This "Game" is in HEAVY development 

at this point is isnt even a game

-----What is this thing?-----

This "game" is a prototype for a project known as Home Decorator Simulator.  A simple game where there are no rules, no objectives, and no limits (other than the fact that I cant make games).  Build what you want with the objects and maps included.  Go crazy.
